title: Hydration
body: Always keep fresh water available for your pet and change it daily.

title: Regular Exercise
body: Walk or play with your pet daily — 20–30 minutes helps physical health.

title: Balanced Diet
body: Feed appropriate portions and avoid sudden diet changes.

title: Grooming
body: Brush fur regularly and trim nails when needed to prevent discomfort.

title: Vaccinations
body: Keep vaccinations up to date and follow your vet's schedule.
